meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or community.
meanings.sent1: The newb asked a lot of questions to learn more about the game.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a newb when she couldn't find the right button to press.
meanings.sent3: The newb accidentally walked into a wall in the virtual world.
meanings.sent4: He was a newb in the world of coding, trying to decipher the complex language.
meanings.sent5: The newb's excitement was contagious as they explored the online forum for the first time.

meanings.definition: To act like a newb or exhibit behavior typical of a newb.
meanings.sent1: Don't newb around and make mistakes on purpose.
meanings.sent2: She tends to newb whenever she tries a new game for the first time.
meanings.sent3: He decided to newb his way through the puzzle, hoping for a lucky guess.
meanings.sent4: She didn't want to newb it up during the competition, so she practiced hard.
meanings.sent5: The team had to newb their way through the challenge, learning as they went along.
